name: Doomino's Pizza
description:
Doomino’s Pizza Delivery is a short game about delivering a pizza to Satan. The theme was “deeper and deeper” and what’s deeper than the underworld itself?

Loosely based on Dante’s Inferno, travel deeper and deeper into hell, running, jumping, and dashing through nine short levels. Face off against vicious bosses, sneak past hungry demons, and dodge falling pineapples all the while keeping Satan’s pizza fully intact!

The game features an original soundtrack composed by the talented William van Brennet. Each level has its own unique sound, so you’ll be able to jam out the whole time. Journeying through hell has never sounded this good.

All levels are unlocked and skippable, so if you get stuck you’ll be able to play the rest of the game with no issues, but we’d encourage you to start from the beginning to get the full experience!

This game is the product of 72 hours of work for Ludum Dare 48. Enjoy the game!
